How to Become a Mob Boss

2023 | 1 Season | Documentaries

This darkly satirical how-to guide explores the rise and fall of history's most notorious mob bosses and their tactics for success.

Starring: Peter Dinklage

Watch all you want.

How to Become a Mob Boss | Official Trailer | Netflix

Narrator Peter Dinklage guides you through this darkly satirical how-to guide that explores the rise and fall of history's most notorious mob bosses - from Al Capone to Pablo Escobar - and their tactics for success.

First Look at 'How to Become a Mob Boss' on Netflix

In this quick chat, I share a surprising discovery about my involvement in the show and discuss the concept that blends the paths of organized crime figures with those navigating success in legitimate businesses.
